data.name: Jupiter Moons: Mecha - Prologue Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Original soundtrack by Crosspulse for Jupiter Moons: Mecha - Prologue.
data.about_the_game: Original soundtrack by Crosspulse for Jupiter Moons: Mecha - Prologue.
data.short_description: Soundtrack for Jupiter Moons: Mecha - Prologue. Choose your mech, customize your loadout, and build your perfect deck. Experiment with cards to find powerful combinations as you enjoy the tactical combat and deckbuilding in this roguelike adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space
